acf.intro_text: WES is committed to the success of both its partners and the internationally educated candidates they serve. We offer the following free tools to streamline the international admissions process, helping partners achieve their goals.
acf.main_content_item_1_text:
AccessWES is the secure online delivery system we use to deliver WES Evaluation Reports to accredited academic institutions and other recognized organizations. AccessWES is free and provides our partners with real-time updates on evaluation status, high-resolution images of verified academic transcripts, and WES Evaluation Reports in convenient PDF format.

Returning users can login here.
acf.main_content_item_2_text: Partners depend on our expertise in determining which documents are required for a credential evaluation. Click below to try the tool.
acf.main_content_item_3_text:
The WES iGPA Calculator provides partners with instant grade conversion and grade point calculation to determine if international students meet admission requirements. Click the button below to get started or see these frequently asked questions to learn more.

Are You a Student? Use the Student iGPA Calculator.
acf.main_content_item_3_cta_text: Get Started with WES iGPA Calculator
acf.main_content_item_4_text: Simply select the origin country (or territory) and credentials, and we will show the degree equivalency in the U.S. The Degree Equivalency Tool doesn’t replace an official evaluation, but it will give you an idea of what a completed report might show.
acf.main_content_item_5_text:
Our free international education resources for higher education professionals include:

  • Grading scales
  • Profiles of education systems
  • Information on required documentation for credential evaluation
  • Advice on obtaining legitimate international credentials
  • Contact information for ministries of education
